https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8uJB3bWCvAoVVYP3GO5foC85jp5.jpg Carrie's War is an adaptation of a 1973 children's novel by Nina Bawden, set during the Second World War and following two evacuees, Carrie and her younger brother Nick. Carrie's War
